name: American Muscle, Turbo Charged Traffic Racing: A High Octane, Zig-Zag,Exhilarating 3D Game for Motor Heads with Skyline FREE
name_original: American Muscle, Turbo Charged Traffic Racing: A High Octane, Zig-Zag,Exhilarating 3D Game for Motor Heads with Skyline FREE
description:
* An exhilarating ride!* - Justin Walker
* Death wish!! You won't have time to react* - Emma Jordan

An option of 5rides to choose from this game aims to thrill! Watch out for oncoming traffic as you weave your way pass them to max out your best score.
***************************************************
* Un estimulante paseo * - Justin Walker
* Deseo de muerte! No tendrá tiempo para reaccionar * - Emma Jordan

Una opción de 5rides para elegir este juego pretende emocionar! Cuidado con tráfico en dirección contraria mientras te abres camino a pasar al límite de su mejor puntuación.
************************************************
*一个令人振奋的骑* - ！贾斯汀·沃克
*死亡之愿！你不会有时间作出反应* - 艾玛·乔丹

5rides期权从这场比赛中可以选择的目的是快感！注意迎面而来的车辆为您编织自己的方式将它们传递到最大出你的最好成绩。
